name: slidev-firebase
description: How to use (Gemini 3 Flash)[https://deepmind.google/models/gemini/flash] and (Nano Banana)[https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs/nanobanana] with (Genkit)[https://genkit.dev] and (Firebase)[https://firebase.google.com] to create a single page holiday cards app (React + tailwindcss).
